isis.stitle: DIAMONDLIFE™ (BOSCH PIN SLIDE) DISC BRAKES For Vehicles Built Before June 3, 2002 - OPERATION - DISC BRAKE PADS

svcproc.title: DISC BRAKE PADS
svcproc.para:
Refer to Figure 4
for Items in parentheses unless otherwise noted.

The inboard and outboard disc brake pads (Items 13 thru 16) are positioned with both ends mounted on stainless steel slippers (Item 10) covering the anchor plate pad abutments (Item 9). The HX-7A1-EE lining material of inboard disc brake pad (Item 1, Figure 3)
and outboard disc brake pad (Item 2, Figure 3)
are chamfered and are marked with an "ARROW" and the word "FORWARD" for proper installation. Brake pads are NOT interchangeable from inboard to outboard side on the same wheel. The optional HX-402-EE lining material of inboard and outboard disc brake pads (Item 3, Figure 3)
are NOT chamfered and ARE interchangeable from inboard to outboard side on the same wheel. The optional SOFTER lining material of inboard and outboard disc brake pads (Item 3, Figure 3)
are NOT chamfered and ARE interchangeable from inboard to outboard side on the same wheel.
